plot outline: "Randhawa" is a action thriller film with a mythological touch created by the technical team of "Magadheera". The film revolves around the protagonist Robert who sets off on a journey to a remote village called "Odeyana Samudra" to find answers to the dreams that bother him every single day. In this process he discovers more than what he wanted to know! Is Robert who he really thought he was until today ? Is there past life connection between wildlife photographer Robert and King Randhawa? Does the notorious Spot bellied eagle owl/devil owl bring the connection between the two time zones ? Is the world we live in an illusion by itself ? Is there time travel ? Does Robert find the answers to his questions ? Get ready for this exciting & thrilling rollercoaster journey from the year 1827 to 2019 & back !! Seatbelts on !
title: Randhawa
plot: A thriller that sends the protagonist on a search for the truth and his true identity.

"_Randhawa_ (qv)" is a action thriller film with a mythological touch created by the technical team of "Magadheera". The film revolves around the protagonist Robert who sets off on a journey to a remote village called "Odeyana Samudra" to find answers to the dreams that bother him every single day. In this process he discovers more than what he wanted to know! Is Robert who he really thought he was until today ? Is there past life connection between wildlife photographer Robert and King _Randhawa_ (qv)? Does the notorious Spot bellied eagle owl/devil owl bring the connection between the two time zones ? Is the world we live in an illusion by itself ? Is there time travel ? Does Robert find the answers to his questions ? Get ready for this exciting & thrilling rollercoaster journey from the year 1827 to 2019 & back !! Seatbelts on !::sunilcaresu

Robert is troubled by nightmares. In his quest to know more about his condition, he takes a trip along with his friend Razzak. They visit a village named Odeyana Samudra where Robert meets Vasupradha, the daughter of the village's landlord and falls in love with her. Vasupradha and Robert, together, go on an expedition to find out the truth behind the mystery of loud screams that plague the village at night. In his search, Robert discovers that he has reincarnated and has lived his past life as _Randhawa_ (qv).::anonymous
